channel.title: Help with webclient
channel.description:
i am just getting error after error for like 4 days now i really wish someone would help me my newest problem is i am using the complete pwnscape source and client
load: client can't be instantiated. java.lang.InstantiationException: client at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) load: client.class can't be instantiated. java.lang.InstantiationException: client at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
and i already know what one of yall are are gona say delete ur class files then recompile well i tried that and got another error one that made it to where i couldnt even run my client anymore so i redownloaded and did rics tutorial all the way perfectly and it still didnt work the problem is my client.jar wont run on my desktop i jarred it just like ric did only changed all the names to mine and put my client in there here is my client.jar errors [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/i2v8ut.jpg[/img] and [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rmuo1d.jpg[/img] if you wish to help me thru this tough time you can add me on any messenger server-eric@live.com - thanks for reading - Sincerely Eric

item.title: Help with webclient
item.dc:creator: @myspaceman123 myspaceman123
item.description:
@myspaceman123 wrote:

i am just getting error after error for like 4 days now i really wish someone would help me my newest problem is i am using the complete pwnscape source and client

load: client can't be instantiated. java.lang.InstantiationException: client at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) load: client.class can't be instantiated. java.lang.InstantiationException: client at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

and i already know what one of yall are are gona say delete ur class files then recompile well i tried that and got another error one that made it to where i couldnt even run my client anymore so i redownloaded and did rics tutorial all the way perfectly and it still didnt work the problem is my client.jar wont run on my desktop i jarred it just like ric did only changed all the names to mine and put my client in there

here is my client.jar errors

and

if you wish to help me thru this tough time you can add me on any messenger server-eric@live.com - thanks for reading
